title: Reset Password
content: To reset your password, go to Settings > Security > Change Password. You will receive an email with a verification link.

title: Refund Policy
content: Refunds are allowed within 7 days of purchase. The item must be unused and in its original packaging. Contact billing@example.com to start the process.

title: Shipping Times
content: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. International shipping can take up to 14 business days depending on the destination.

title: Contact Support
content: You can reach our human support team via live chat between 9 AM and 5 PM EST, or email support@example.com.

title: Subscription Cancellation
content: Cancel your subscription any time from the 'Billing' tab in your dashboard. Access remains until the end of the current billing cycle.
